Terms and Conditions

1. User Account, Password, and Security
• To access and use Bunkar Banaras's services, users must create an account.
• Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account details and are liable for any activity conducted through their account.
• In case of unauthorized access or any breach of security, users must notify Bunkar Banaras immediately.
2. Services Offered
• Bunkar Banaras offers a platform for purchasing fashion products and related services.
• Products and services are available within India only.
• Bunkar Banaras reserves the right to modify or discontinue any service without notice.
3. Platform for Transaction and Communication
• The website serves as a platform for transactions between buyers and sellers.
• Users can communicate with each other through the platform.
• Bunkar Banaras is not responsible for the quality, safety, or legality of products and services.
4. User Conduct and Rules on the Platform
• Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
• Misuse or fraudulent activities on the platform are strictly prohibited.
• Bunkar Banaras reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts for violations of these rules.
5. Contents Posted on Platform
• Users may post content on the platform, including product listings and reviews.
• Bunkar Banaras may moderate and remove content that violates policies.
• Users retain the rights to their content but grant Bunkar Banaras a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute it.
6. Disclaimer of Warranties and Liability
• Bunkar Banaras makes no warranties regarding product quality, fitness for a particular purpose, or accuracy of product descriptions.
• Bunkar Banaras is not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use of the platform.
7. Selling
• Sellers on Bunkar Banaras are required to provide accurate product descriptions and prices.
• Sellers must ensure the availability of listed products.
• Bunkar Banaras may limit or prohibit sales by sellers who violate policies.
8. Payment
• Payment processing is facilitated by authorized payment gateways.
• Bunkar Banaras ensures secure transactions but is not responsible for any financial data breach.
9. E-Platform for Communication
• Users consent to receive communication from Bunkar Banaras electronically.
• Emails, SMS, or notifications on the platform may be used for communication purposes.
10. Indemnity
• Users agree to indemnify and hold Bunkar Banaras, its affiliates, and employees harmless from any claims, losses, or damages.
• This includes legal fees resulting from user violations of the terms and conditions.
11. Trademark, Copyright and Restriction
• All content on the Bunkar Banaras website, including logos and trademarks, is protected by copyright laws.
• Unauthorized use of this content is prohibited.
12. Limitation of Liability
• Bunkar Banaras's liability is limited to the amount paid by the user for the product or service in question.
• Bunkar Banaras is not responsible for any indirect or consequential losses.
13. Termination
• Bunkar Banaras reserves the right to terminate user accounts at its discretion.
• Users may terminate their accounts by following the provided procedures.
14. Jurisdictional Issues/Sale in India Only
• Bunkar Banaras operates under the jurisdiction of Indian law.
• Sales are restricted to customers within India.
15. Governing Law
• These terms and conditions are governed by Indian law.
16. Contacting the Seller
• Users may contact sellers for queries or concerns.
• Bunkar Banaras is not responsible for the actions or responses of sellers.
17. Disclaimer
• All information provided on the platform is for general informational purposes.
• Bunkar Banaras is not liable for any inaccuracies or errors in this information.
18. Alteration Services
• Bunkar Banaras may provide alteration services, subject to terms and conditions.
• Users should review specific alteration policies before requesting services.
19. Convenience Fee
• Bunkar Banaras may charge a convenience fee for specific services.
• Users are informed of these charges before making payments.
